content: Best of luck with the program. Imposter syndrome effects many people. Even with its armchair psych foundation in the tech scene the concept seems to be a good foil and actually emboldening for some. It is my experience that a way to shape imposter feelings into more productive paths is to study Growth Mindsets. A core idea is that your current state is *not yet* your goal state, as opposed to your goal state being unachievable.
